#### Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Software Development Report (DD Form 3026-3)
The `r prime_vs_sub` shall prepare and submit the "Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Software Development Report (DD Form 3026-3)" in accordance with CDRL `r ERP_CDRL_numb`. The "Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Software Development Report (DD Form 3026-3)" reports expected and actual cost and performance data associated with the development of ERP systems.
